== first line ==
Simony is not defined, per se, in the new testament. The church's teaching on simony is derived from an account in scripture (the one cited in Acts 8). The first line of the article should be updated to reflect this distinction. [[Special:Contributions/76.167.93.99|76.167.93.99]] ([[User talk:76.167.93.99|talk]]) 06:17, 22 March 2010 (UTC)
